main_caption: Describe the scene in the image below with an elaborte caption. Pay attention to small details and make the description engaging and immersive.
object_listing: List all the objects in the image.
entity_count: How many objects/entities are there in the image.
standout_features: What are the standout elements/features in the image.
color_listing: Enlist all the colors you see in the image.
emotional_ambiance: Describe the prevailing emotional ambiance depicted in the image.
locations: Does this setting take place inside or outside.
outdoor_setting: What weather conditions are depicted in this image.
indoor_setting: What is the ligthing condition of the indoor setting in the image.
activity: What kind of activity is occuring in this image.
human_presence: Do you see humans in the image.
human_attire: Please provide a description of the clothing worn by the individuals in the image.
human_count: Determine the number of individuals depicted in the image who are human.
color_category:
What is the color type of this image:
(a) Color-Image
(b) Black & White Image
age: Are the living entities in the image perceived as mature or youthful?
camera_perspective: What is the source of camera perspective in the image?
